title: 求一张或几张老板商店的图片[参考一下]
author: 寂静人心
txt_content: 比如name lore 这2行的设计图片 我参考一下。。最近在弄 实在不知道怎么写好了{:10_516:}

replies.author: lichi2050
replies.txt_content:
ShopName: hhh
signs:
  text: '[3呵呵商店]'
  NeedPermissionToCreateSign: true
shop:
  jilaoShop:
    RewardType: shop
    PriceType: free
    Reward: BuyShop
    MenuItem:
    - type:GLASS
    - amount:1
    - name:&9&l基佬市场 &6[+]
    - lore:&8备注：一大堆的基佬正准备对刚出炉的商品进行猥琐
    Message: ''
    InventoryLocation: 1
    ExtraPermission: ''
  huishoShop:
    RewardType: shop
    PriceType: free
    Reward: SellShop
    MenuItem:
    - type:COBBLESTONE
    - amount:1
    - name:&b&l哈腰回收厂 &6[+]
    - lore:&8备注：我们的原则是点头哈腰向您回收辣鸡
    Message: ''
    InventoryLocation: 3
    ExtraPermission: ''
